attributes.action: REQUEST THAT ALL SCHOOLS & NUSERIES ARE FORCED TO INFORM PARENTS/CARERS, OF OUTBREAKS OF ALL COMMUNICABLE PARASITES & ILLNESSES
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We The Undersigned, as Parents, Carers, Friends & Families, of Our Nations Children, ask that the Government produce & enforce a sensible NATIONAL POLICY as regards information of out breaks of Childhood Communicable Parasites & Diseases.
We request to be ALWAYS INFORMED as soon as an outbreak is known to the Childs School, Nursery or Playgroup, so we can be responsible parents, & be more vigilant with our own children in the face of a known outbreak, especially in the face of Parasites/Illnesses with easily missed early symptoms, such as thread worms.
At present guidelines & information, are left to the Local Authority, which means there is NO national policy, & no enforceable policy, & Policy varies from area to area, in most cases, Policy being very unhelpful to parents, in that WE CURRENTLY HAVE NO RIGHT TO BE INFORMED. 
We Request that the Government create a National Policy, so we as Parents/Carers have a right to be informed of ALL outbreaks, so we can be more vigilant, & reduce repeated outbreaks.
